name: weavescope-probe
description:
Live visualisation, monitoring and management

Weave Scope produces a live interactive map of your containerized services and applications with no coding and no instrumentation
postInstallNotes:
This package provides the Weave Scope probe container. If service token was provided, it will reports data to Weave Cloud, otherwise you should install the `weavescope` package which provides standalone user interface.

More documentation can be found on [Weaveworks website](http://weave.works).
